sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: MarketWise (NASDAQ:MKTW) Shares Down 0.7% - What's Next?
feed.summary: MarketWise (NASDAQ:MKTW) saw its share price fall by 0.7% to $15.99 on Wednesday, with trading volume significantly lower than average. Despite the stock dip, the company reported strong quarterly earnings, beating analyst estimates for both EPS and revenue, and declared a quarterly dividend implying a 5.0% yield. Analysts have a split view, resulting in an average "Hold" rating with a $20.00 price target, while institutional ownership stands at over 23%.

feed.title: MarketWise Engages Advisors Amid Acquisition Proposal
feed.summary: MarketWise (MKTW) has appointed Centerview Partners LLC and Kirkland & Ellis LLP as financial and legal advisors, respectively, to evaluate an unsolicited acquisition proposal of $17.25 per share from Monument & Cathedral Holdings, LLC. The Special Committee is assessing this offer and potential alternatives, though a transaction is not guaranteed. MarketWise's stock currently has a Hold rating with a $18.50 price target from analysts, while TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates MKTW as Neutral due to strong valuation but concerns over declining revenue and negative equity.

feed.title: MarketWise receives $17.25 per share acquisition proposal from M&C
feed.summary: MarketWise, Inc. (NASDAQ:MKTW) has received an unsolicited non-binding acquisition proposal from Monument & Cathedral Holdings, LLC (M&C) to buy all outstanding equity interests not already owned by M&C for $17.25 per share in cash. This proposal, contingent on terminating the company’s tax receivable agreement, represents a premium over MarketWise’s current market capitalization and an 18% premium over the previous day's closing price. A Special Committee of the Board is evaluating the offer and potential alternatives, with financial and legal advisors retained.

feed.title: MarketWise (MKTW) Committee, Centerview and Kirkland & Ellis Address $17.25 Proposal
feed.summary: MarketWise (NASDAQ: MKTW) confirmed it received an unsolicited, non-binding acquisition proposal from Monument & Cathedral Holdings to buy all outstanding shares not owned by M&C for $17.25 per share. A Special Committee of the Board of Directors has been formed to evaluate this proposal and any other available alternatives. Centerview Partners LLC has been retained as the financial advisor and Kirkland & Ellis LLP as the legal advisor to the Special Committee.

feed.title: Looking Into Marketwise Inc's Recent Short Interest
feed.summary: Marketwise Inc's short interest has increased by 52.94% since its last report, with 27 thousand shares sold short, representing 1.3% of tradable shares. It would take traders 1.45 days to cover these positions. While this indicates increased bearish sentiment, Marketwise Inc's short interest is lower than its peer group average of 4.65%.

feed.title: MarketWise Reports Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
feed.summary: MarketWise, Inc. has announced its third-quarter 2025 financial results, reporting $81.3 million in net revenue and a net income of $17.9 million. The company showcased a 30% year-over-year increase in Billings to $63.7 million and a strengthened cash position with no outstanding debt, while also declaring a total dividend of $0.40 per Class A share for the quarter. Strategic initiatives include price increases, subscriber base stabilization, ongoing capital allocation management, and preliminary targets for FY 2026 showing significant growth in CFFO and Billings.

feed.title: MarketWise declares quarterly and special dividends totaling $0.40 per share
feed.summary: MarketWise, Inc. (NASDAQ:MKTW) announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.20 per share and a special dividend of $0.20 per share, totaling $0.40 per share for Class A common stockholders. These dividends, payable on December 24, 2025, bring MarketWise's total dividend payments for fiscal year 2025 to $1.90 per share, representing a 13% dividend yield. The company's stock currently appears undervalued with a P/E ratio of 5.89 and has delivered impressive YTD returns of nearly 66%.

feed.title: MarketWise Reports Net Revenue of $81.3 Million and Net Income of $17.9 Million for Third Quarter 2025; Third Quarter Billings Increased 30% YoY; Announced Quarterly and Special Dividend Totaling $0.40 per Class A Share, for Total FY 2025 Dividends of $1.90 Per Share, or a 13% Cash Yield; Provides Preliminary Targets for FY 2026, Including a 50% Planned Increase in CFFO
feed.summary: MarketWise reported strong financial results for Q3 2025, with net revenue of $81.3 million and net income of $17.9 million. Billings increased 30% year-over-year, and the company announced quarterly and special dividends totaling $0.40 per Class A share, bringing total FY 2025 dividends to $1.90 per share. MarketWise also provided preliminary targets for FY 2026, including a 50% planned increase in Cash Flow From Operations (CFFO).

feed.title: MarketWise (NASDAQ: MKTW) announces $0.40 dividend; annual yield 13% for Class A shares
feed.summary: MarketWise (NASDAQ: MKTW) declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.20 per Class A share and a $0.20 distribution for Class B units, alongside a special dividend of $0.20 for Class A shares. These payments, including previous ones, bring the total dividends for FY 2025 to $1.90 per share, resulting in a 13% yield based on the stock price as of October 29, 2025. All dividends will be paid on December 24, 2025, with a record date of November 14, 2025.

feed.title: MarketWise Declares Quarterly and Special Dividend Totaling $0.40 Per Class A Share, for Total FY 2025 Dividends of $1.90 Per Share, or a 13% Cash Yield
feed.summary: MarketWise, Inc. (NASDAQ: MKTW) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.20 per share and a special dividend of $0.20 per share for Class A common stock holders, totaling $0.40 per share. Coupled with comparable distributions for MarketWise, LLC units, these dividends will bring the total dividends for FY 2025 to $1.90 per share, resulting in a 13% dividend yield based on the October 29, 2025 stock price. The payments are scheduled for December 24, 2025, with a record date of November 14, 2025.

feed.title: MarketWise Rewards Shareholders With $0.40 Combined Dividend Payout Before Q2 2025 Results
feed.summary: MarketWise (NASDAQ: MKTW) has declared a total dividend of $0.40 per Class A share, composed of a $0.20 quarterly cash dividend and a $0.20 special dividend, payable on September 25, 2025, to shareholders of record on August 15, 2025. An equivalent distribution will also be made to MarketWise, LLC unit holders. Additionally, the company announced it would release its Q2 2025 financial results before the market opens on August 7, 2025.

feed.title: MarketWise Announces Appointment of Dr. David Eifrig as Chief Executive Officer
feed.summary: MarketWise, Inc. announced the permanent appointment of Dr. David Eifrig as Chief Executive Officer, effective immediately. Dr. Eifrig previously served as interim CEO since August 2024 and is credited with improved financial performance and earning stakeholder confidence. The announcement highlights his extensive background in finance and medicine, and his long-standing contributions to MarketWise's financial research offerings.
